@@ -0,0 +1,6 @@

+<project version="4">
+  <component name="CompilerConfiguration">
+    <bytecodeTargetLevel target="1.8" />
+  </component>
+</project>

@@ -15,6 +15,7 @@
           </set>
         </option>
         <option name="resolveModulePerSourceSet" value="false" />
+        <option name="useQualifiedModuleNames" value="true" />
       </GradleProjectSettings>
     </option>

@@ -1,6 +1,6 @@
 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
 <project version="4">
-  <component name="ProjectRootManager" version="2" languageLevel="JDK_1_8" project-jdk-name="1.8" project-jdk-type="JavaSDK">
+  <component name="ProjectRootManager" version="2" languageLevel="JDK_1_8" default="true" project-jdk-name="1.8" project-jdk-type="JavaSDK">
     <output url="file://$PROJECT_DIR$/build/classes" />
   </component>
   <component name="ProjectType">

@@ -30,6 +30,7 @@ dependencies {
     implementation fileTree(dir: "libs", include: ["*.jar"])
     implementation 'androidx.appcompat:appcompat:1.2.0'
     implementation 'androidx.constraintlayout:constraintlayout:2.0.4'
+    implementation 'com.google.android.material:material:1.3.0'
     testImplementation 'junit:junit:4.12'
     androidTestImplementation 'androidx.test.ext:junit:1.1.2'
     androidTestImplementation 'androidx.test.espresso:espresso-core:3.3.0'

@@ -8,7 +8,8 @@
         android:label="@string/app_name"
         android:roundIcon="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round"
         android:supportsRtl="true"
-        android:theme="@style/AppTheme">
+        android:theme="@style/AppThemeClassic">
+        <activity android:name=".SettingsActivity"></activity>
         <activity android:name=".MainActivity">
             <intent-filter>
                 <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />

@@ -0,0 +1,36 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    style="@style/BackgroundColor"
+    tools:context=".MainActivity">
+
+    <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+        android:id="@+id/settings_button"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_marginTop="1dp"
+        android:layout_marginEnd="1dp"
+        android:text="@string/settings"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
+
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/action_screen"
+        style="@style/ActionScreenText"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
+
+    <include
+        layout="@layout/table_numpad"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />
+
+
+</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,96 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    style="@style/BackgroundColor"
+    tools:context=".SettingsActivity">
+
+    <com.google.android.material.textview.MaterialTextView
+        android:id="@+id/materialTextView"
+        style="@style/ActionScreenText"
+        android:text="@string/settings"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/settings_key_size"
+        android:layout_margin="0dp"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
+
+    <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+        android:id="@+id/materialButton"
+        style="@style/HorizontalLine"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="2dp"
+        android:ems="14"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/materialTextView" />
+
+    <com.google.android.material.textview.MaterialTextView
+        android:id="@+id/materialTextView2"
+        style="@style/settings_screen_text"
+        android:layout_marginTop="28dp"
+        android:layout_marginEnd="16dp"
+        android:text="@string/classic_theme"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@+id/radioButtons"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/materialTextView" />
+
+    <RadioGroup
+        android:id="@+id/radioButtons"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_marginTop="16dp"
+        android:layout_marginEnd="16dp"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/materialTextView">
+
+        <com.google.android.material.radiobutton.MaterialRadioButton
+            android:id="@+id/materialRadioClassic"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
+            android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" />
+
+        <com.google.android.material.radiobutton.MaterialRadioButton
+            android:id="@+id/materialRadioWhite"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
+            android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" />
+
+        <com.google.android.material.radiobutton.MaterialRadioButton
+            android:id="@+id/materialRadioDark"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
+            android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" />
+    </RadioGroup>
+
+    <com.google.android.material.textview.MaterialTextView
+        android:id="@+id/materialTextView3"
+        style="@style/settings_screen_text"
+        android:layout_marginTop="12dp"
+        android:layout_marginEnd="16dp"
+        android:text="@string/white_theme"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@+id/radioButtons"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/materialTextView2" />
+
+    <com.google.android.material.textview.MaterialTextView
+        style="@style/settings_screen_text"
+        android:layout_marginTop="12dp"
+        android:layout_marginEnd="16dp"
+        android:text="@string/dark_theme"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@+id/radioButtons"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/materialTextView3" />
+
+    <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+        android:id="@+id/back_to_main"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_marginEnd="16dp"
+        android:layout_marginBottom="16dp"
+        android:text="@string/back_to_main_button"
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
+
+
+</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,239 @@
+<TableLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    >
+
+    <TableRow
+        android:weightSum="4.1">
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/buttonC"
+            style="@style/ButtonFormsSymbols"
+            android:text="@string/buttonC"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            style="@style/VerticalLine"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/buttonSplit"
+            style="@style/ButtonFormsSymbols"
+            android:text="@string/buttonSplit"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            style="@style/VerticalLine"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/buttonX"
+            style="@style/ButtonFormsSymbols"
+            android:text="@string/buttonX"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            style="@style/VerticalLine"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/buttonBack"
+            style="@style/ButtonFormsSymbols"
+            android:text="@string/buttonBack"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+    </TableRow>
+
+    <TableRow
+        android:weightSum="1">
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            style="@style/HorizontalLine"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+    </TableRow>
+
+    <TableRow
+        android:weightSum="4.1">
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/buttonSeven"
+            style="@style/ButtonFormsNumbers"
+            android:text="@string/button7"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            style="@style/VerticalLine"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/buttonEight"
+            style="@style/ButtonFormsNumbers"
+            android:text="@string/button8"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            style="@style/VerticalLine"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/buttonNine"
+            style="@style/ButtonFormsNumbers"
+            android:text="@string/button9"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            style="@style/VerticalLine"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/buttonMinus"
+            style="@style/ButtonFormsSymbols"
+            android:text="@string/buttonMinus"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+    </TableRow>
+
+    <TableRow
+        android:weightSum="1">
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            style="@style/HorizontalLine"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+    </TableRow>
+
+    <TableRow
+        android:weightSum="4.1">
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/buttonFour"
+            style="@style/ButtonFormsNumbers"
+            android:text="@string/button4"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            style="@style/VerticalLine"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/buttonFive"
+            style="@style/ButtonFormsNumbers"
+            android:text="@string/button5"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            style="@style/VerticalLine"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/buttonSix"
+            style="@style/ButtonFormsNumbers"
+            android:text="@string/button6"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            style="@style/VerticalLine"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/buttonPlus"
+            style="@style/ButtonFormsSymbols"
+            android:text="@string/buttonPlus"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+    </TableRow>
+
+    <TableRow
+        android:weightSum="1">
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            style="@style/HorizontalLine"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+    </TableRow>
+
+    <TableRow
+        android:weightSum="4.1">
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/buttonOne"
+            style="@style/ButtonFormsNumbers"
+            android:text="@string/button1"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            style="@style/VerticalLine"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/buttonTwo"
+            style="@style/ButtonFormsNumbers"
+            android:text="@string/button2"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            style="@style/VerticalLine"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/buttonThree"
+            style="@style/ButtonFormsNumbers"
+            android:text="@string/button3"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            style="@style/VerticalLine"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+
+            android:id="@+id/buttonPercent"
+            style="@style/ButtonFormsSymbols"
+            android:text="@string/buttonPercent"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+    </TableRow>
+
+    <TableRow
+        android:weightSum="1">
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            style="@style/HorizontalLine"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+    </TableRow>
+
+    <TableRow
+        android:weightSum="4.1">
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/buttonBrackets"
+            style="@style/ButtonFormsNumbers"
+            android:text="@string/buttonBrackets"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            style="@style/VerticalLine"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/buttonZero"
+            style="@style/ButtonFormsNumbers"
+            android:text="@string/button0"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            style="@style/VerticalLine"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/buttonPoint"
+            style="@style/ButtonFormsNumbers"
+            android:text="@string/buttonPoint"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            style="@style/VerticalLine"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+        <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+            android:id="@+id/buttonEqually"
+            style="@style/ButtonFormsEqually"
+            android:text="@string/buttonEqually"
+            app:cornerRadius="0dp"
+            />
+    </TableRow>
+</TableLayout>

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    style="@style/BackgroundColor"
+    tools:context=".SettingsActivity">
+
+    <com.google.android.material.textview.MaterialTextView
+        android:id="@+id/materialTextView"
+        style="@style/ActionScreenText"
+        android:text="@string/settings"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/settings_key_size"
+        android:layout_margin="0dp"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
+
+    <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+        android:id="@+id/materialButton"
+        style="@style/HorizontalLine"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="2dp"
+        android:ems="14"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/materialTextView" />
+
+    <com.google.android.material.textview.MaterialTextView
+        android:id="@+id/materialTextView2"
+        style="@style/settings_screen_text"
+        android:layout_marginTop="28dp"
+        android:layout_marginEnd="16dp"
+        android:text="@string/classic_theme"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@+id/radioButtons"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/materialTextView" />
+
+    <RadioGroup
+        android:id="@+id/radioButtons"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_marginTop="16dp"
+        android:layout_marginEnd="16dp"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/materialTextView">
+
+        <com.google.android.material.radiobutton.MaterialRadioButton
+            android:id="@+id/materialRadioClassic"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
+            android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" />
+
+        <com.google.android.material.radiobutton.MaterialRadioButton
+            android:id="@+id/materialRadioWhite"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
+            android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" />
+
+        <com.google.android.material.radiobutton.MaterialRadioButton
+            android:id="@+id/materialRadioDark"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
+            android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" />
+    </RadioGroup>
+
+    <com.google.android.material.textview.MaterialTextView
+        android:id="@+id/materialTextView3"
+        style="@style/settings_screen_text"
+        android:layout_marginTop="12dp"
+        android:layout_marginEnd="16dp"
+        android:text="@string/white_theme"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@+id/radioButtons"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/materialTextView2" />
+
+    <com.google.android.material.textview.MaterialTextView
+        style="@style/settings_screen_text"
+        android:layout_marginTop="12dp"
+        android:layout_marginEnd="16dp"
+        android:text="@string/dark_theme"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@+id/radioButtons"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/materialTextView3" />
+
+    <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+        android:id="@+id/back_to_main"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_marginEnd="16dp"
+        android:layout_marginBottom="16dp"
+        android:text="@string/back_to_main_button"
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
+
+
+</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

@@ -0,0 +1,86 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+    <resources>
+        <style name="BackgroundColor">
+            <item name="android:background">?colorOnBackground</item>
+        </style>
+
+        <style name="ButtonFormsNumbers">
+            <item name="android:layout_width">0dp</item>
+            <item name="android:layout_height">wrap_content</item>
+            <item name="android:layout_weight">1</item>
+            <item name="android:gravity">center</item>
+            <item name="android:insetTop">0dp</item>
+            <item name="android:insetBottom">0dp</item>
+            <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif-thin</item>
+            <item name="android:textSize">@dimen/key_text_size</item>
+            <item name="android:backgroundTint">?colorPrimary</item>
+            <item name="android:textColor">?colorOnPrimary</item>
+            <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item>
+        </style>
+
+        <style name="ButtonFormsSymbols">
+            <item name="android:layout_width">0dp</item>
+            <item name="android:layout_height">wrap_content</item>
+            <item name="android:layout_weight">1</item>
+            <item name="android:gravity">center</item>
+            <item name="android:insetTop">0dp</item>
+            <item name="android:insetBottom">0dp</item>
+            <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif-thin</item>
+            <item name="android:textSize">@dimen/key_text_size</item>
+            <item name="android:backgroundTint">?colorSecondary</item>
+            <item name="android:textColor">?colorOnSecondary</item>
+            <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item>
+        </style>
+
+        <style name="ButtonFormsEqually">
+            <item name="android:layout_width">0dp</item>
+            <item name="android:layout_height">wrap_content</item>
+            <item name="android:layout_weight">1</item>
+            <item name="android:gravity">center</item>
+            <item name="android:insetTop">0dp</item>
+            <item name="android:insetBottom">0dp</item>
+            <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif-thin</item>
+            <item name="android:textSize">@dimen/key_text_size</item>
+            <item name="android:backgroundTint">?attr/colorEquallyButton</item>
+            <item name="android:textColor">?attr/textColorEquallyButton</item>
+            <item name="android:textStyle">bold</item>
+        </style>
+
+        <style name="HorizontalLine">
+            <item name="android:layout_width">match_parent</item>
+            <item name="android:layout_height">2dp</item>
+            <item name="android:layout_weight">1</item>
+            <item name="android:backgroundTint">?attr/colorAccent</item>
+            <item name="android:insetTop">0dp</item>
+            <item name="android:insetBottom">0dp</item>
+        </style>
+
+        <style name="VerticalLine">
+            <item name="android:layout_width">0dp</item>>
+            <item name="android:layout_height">match_parent</item>>
+            <item name="android:layout_weight">0.025</item>
+            <item name="android:backgroundTint">?colorAccent</item>
+            <item name="android:insetTop">0dp</item>
+            <item name="android:insetBottom">0dp</item>
+        </style>
+
+        <style name="ActionScreenText">
+            <item name="android:layout_width">match_parent</item>
+            <item name="android:layout_height">wrap_content</item>
+            <item name="android:layout_marginTop">50dp</item>
+            <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif-thin</item>
+            <item name="android:gravity">right</item>
+            <item name="android:textSize">@dimen/screen_text_size</item>
+            <item name="android:textColor">?colorOnPrimary</item>
+            <item name="android:textStyle">italic|bold</item>
+        </style>
+
+        <style name="settings_screen_text">
+            <item name="android:layout_width">wrap_content</item>
+            <item name="android:layout_height">wrap_content</item>
+            <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif-thin</item>
+            <item name="android:textSize">@dimen/theme_settings_key_size</item>
+            <item name="android:textColor">?colorOnPrimary</item>
+            <item name="android:textStyle">italic</item>
+        </style>
+    </resources>

@@ -0,0 +1,13 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<resources xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
+    <style name="AppThemeClassic" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.Light.NoActionBar">
+        <item name="colorOnBackground">@color/backgroundColorDark</item>
+        <item name="colorPrimary">@color/buttonDark</item>
+        <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/buttonNumberTextDark</item>
+        <item name="colorSecondary">@color/buttonDark</item>
+        <item name="colorOnSecondary">@color/buttonSymbolTextDark</item>
+        <item name="colorAccent">@color/line</item>
+        <item name="colorEquallyButton">@color/buttonDark</item>
+        <item name="textColorEquallyButton">@color/buttonEquallyTextDark</item>
+    </style>
+</resources>

+        <item name="android:gravity">center</item>
+        <item name="android:insetTop">0dp</item>
+        <item name="android:insetBottom">0dp</item>
+        <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif-thin</item>
+        <item name="android:textSize">@dimen/key_text_size</item>
+        <item name="android:backgroundTint">?colorSecondary</item>
+        <item name="android:textColor">?colorOnSecondary</item>
+    </style>
+
+    <style name="ButtonFormsEqually">
+        <item name="android:layout_width">0dp</item>
+        <item name="android:layout_height">wrap_content</item>
+        <item name="android:layout_weight">1</item>
+        <item name="android:gravity">center</item>
+        <item name="android:insetTop">0dp</item>
+        <item name="android:insetBottom">0dp</item>
+        <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif-thin</item>
+        <item name="android:textSize">@dimen/key_text_size</item>
+        <item name="android:backgroundTint">?attr/colorEquallyButton</item>
+        <item name="android:textColor">?attr/textColorEquallyButton</item>
+    </style>
+
+    <style name="HorizontalLine">
+        <item name="android:layout_width">match_parent</item>
+        <item name="android:layout_height">2dp</item>
+        <item name="android:layout_weight">1</item>
+        <item name="android:backgroundTint">?attr/colorAccent</item>
+        <item name="android:insetTop">0dp</item>
+        <item name="android:insetBottom">0dp</item>
+    </style>
+
+    <style name="VerticalLine">
+        <item name="android:layout_width">0dp</item>>
+        <item name="android:layout_height">match_parent</item>>
+        <item name="android:layout_weight">0.025</item>
+        <item name="android:backgroundTint">?colorAccent</item>
+        <item name="android:insetTop">0dp</item>
+        <item name="android:insetBottom">0dp</item>
+    </style>
+
+    <style name="ActionScreenText">
+        <item name="android:layout_width">match_parent</item>
+        <item name="android:layout_height">wrap_content</item>
+        <item name="android:layout_marginTop">50dp</item>
+        <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif-thin</item>
+        <item name="android:gravity">right</item>
+        <item name="android:textSize">@dimen/screen_text_size</item>
+        <item name="android:textColor">?colorOnPrimary</item>
+        <item name="android:textStyle">italic</item>
+    </style>
+
+    <style name="settings_screen_text">
+        <item name="android:layout_width">wrap_content</item>
+        <item name="android:layout_height">wrap_content</item>
+        <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif-thin</item>
+        <item name="android:textSize">@dimen/theme_settings_key_size</item>
+        <item name="android:textColor">?colorOnPrimary</item>
+        <item name="android:textStyle">italic</item>
+    </style>
+
+
 </resources>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,38 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<resources xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
+    <style name="AppThemeClassic" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.Light.NoActionBar">
+        <item name="colorOnBackground">@color/backgroundColor</item>
+        <item name="colorPrimary">@color/buttonNumber</item>
+        <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/buttonNumberText</item>
+        <item name="colorSecondary">@color/buttonSymbol</item>
+        <item name="colorOnSecondary">@color/buttonSymbolText</item>
+        <item name="colorAccent">@color/line</item>
+        <item name="colorEquallyButton">@color/buttonSymbolText</item>
+        <item name="textColorEquallyButton">@color/buttonNumber</item>
+    </style>
+
+    <style name="WhiteTheme" parent="AppThemeClassic">
+        <item name="colorOnBackground">@color/backgroundColor</item>
+        <item name="colorPrimary">@color/buttonNumber</item>
+        <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/buttonSymbolText</item>
+        <item name="colorSecondary">@color/buttonNumber</item>
+        <item name="colorOnSecondary">@color/buttonEquallyTextDark</item>
+        <item name="colorAccent">@color/line</item>
+        <item name="colorEquallyButton">@color/buttonNumber</item>
+        <item name="textColorEquallyButton">@color/buttonNumberText</item>
+    </style>
+
+    <style name="DarkTheme" parent="AppThemeClassic">
+        <item name="colorOnBackground">@color/backgroundColorDark</item>
+        <item name="colorPrimary">@color/buttonDark</item>
+        <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/buttonNumberTextDark</item>
+        <item name="colorSecondary">@color/buttonDark</item>
+        <item name="colorOnSecondary">@color/buttonSymbolTextDark</item>
+        <item name="colorAccent">@color/line</item>
+        <item name="colorEquallyButton">@color/buttonDark</item>
+        <item name="textColorEquallyButton">@color/buttonEquallyTextDark</item>
+    </style>
+
+
+
+</resources>
\ No newline at end of file
